## ABufferOIT class

per-pixel linked list OIT renderer using ABuffer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ABufferOIT extends OIT 
```
**Extends:** [OIT](doc/markdown/./scene.oit.md)

## Remarks

The ABuffer OIT renderer only supports WebGPU device.
